title: AI in Traditional Medicine
abstract: This study explores the integration of artificial intelligence with traditional medicine practices. We developed a machine learning model to analyze traditional herbal formulations and predict their efficacy. The research demonstrates how AI can preserve and enhance traditional knowledge while providing empirical validation.
qa1_reason: The abstract clearly states the study explores AI integration with traditional medicine
qa2_reason: The study mentions developing a machine learning model and predicting efficacy
qa3_reason: The abstract discusses preserving and enhancing traditional knowledge
qa4_reason: The paper directly addresses AI integration with traditional practices

title: Deep Learning for Image Classification
abstract: A novel deep learning architecture for image classification tasks. The model achieves state-of-the-art performance on standard benchmarks through improved attention mechanisms and data augmentation techniques.
qa1_reason: The objective is clearly stated as developing a novel architecture
qa2_reason: The paper mentions achieving state-of-the-art performance on benchmarks
qa3_reason: No mention of traditional community challenges
qa4_reason: No direct mention of AI and traditional community integration

title: Traditional Farming and AI
abstract: This paper investigates the application of AI technologies in traditional farming communities. We present a case study of precision agriculture tools being adapted for small-scale traditional farms, showing improved crop yields while maintaining sustainable practices.
qa1_reason: The research question is clearly about AI in traditional farming
qa2_reason: The paper presents a case study with empirical results on crop yields
qa3_reason: Partially addresses challenges but focuses more on solutions
qa4_reason: Directly addresses AI integration with traditional farming communities
